name: Employee of a Sole Source Employer Shopping During Open Enrollment

steps.name: the shop market configuration is enabled
all announcements are enabled for user to select
a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer Acme Inc.
initial employer Acme Inc. has enrollment_open benefit application
Acme Inc. employer has a staff role
there is a census employee record for Patrick Doe for employer Acme Inc.
employee Patrick Doe already matched with employer Acme Inc. and logged into employee portal
Patrick Doe clicks "Shop for Plans" on my account page
Employee should see the group selection page
I should see a selectable 'health' benefit option
the shop market configuration is enabled
all announcements are enabled for user to select
a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer Acme Inc.
initial employer Acme Inc. has enrollment_open benefit application
Acme Inc. employer has a staff role
there is a census employee record for Patrick Doe for employer Acme Inc.
employee Patrick Doe already matched with employer Acme Inc. and logged into employee portal
Patrick Doe clicks "Shop for Plans" on my account page
Employee should see the group selection page
Employee clicks continue on group selection page
Employee should see the list of plans
I should see the waive coverage button

name: Employee products sorted when employee click on Plan name, Premium Amount, Deductible and Carrier.
description:
Given Employer exists with enrolling plan year
    Given New Employee is on Census Employee Roster
    Given New Employee claimed his employee role
    Then Employee goes for plan shopping
    And Employee should be able to see available products and sorting enabled

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: the shop market configuration is enabled
all announcements are enabled for user to select
a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer Acme Inc.
initial employer Acme Inc. has enrollment_open benefit application with Metal Level plan options
there is a census employee record for Patrick Doe for employer Acme Inc.

elements.name: Employee sort plans by Plan name

steps.name: employee Patrick Doe already matched with employer Acme Inc. and logged into employee portal
Employee clicks "Shop for Plans" on my account page
Employee should see the group selection page
Employee clicks continue on group selection page
Employee should see the list of plans
Employee filters plans by Carrier
Employee should see plans filtered by Carrier

name: Employee products sorted when employee click on Plan name, Premium Amount, Deductible and Carrier.
description:
Given Employer exists with enrolling plan year
    Given New Employee is on Census Employee Roster
    Given New Employee claimed his employee role
    Then Employee goes for plan shopping
    And Employee should be able to see available products and sorting enabled
